attributes.action: Protect Our Privacy: Scrap the Online Safety Act
attributes.additional_details: The Online Safety Act threatens privacy, security, and free expression. By undermining end-to-end encryption, it risks exposing private messages to hackers and mass surveillance. We urge Parliament to repeal or amend the Act, protect secure communications, and consult experts to create laws that keep people safe without sacrificing fundamental digital rights.
attributes.background: We are calling on the UK Government and Parliament to urgently repeal or amend the Online Safety Act to protect the privacy, security, and freedom of every citizen.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Repeal the Online Safety Act
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722903
